text: 07 Feb 2025 6 New Romance Novels for Fans of Kinda Pregnant Love the swoon-worthy romance and heartfelt humor of Kinda Pregnant? Then you won’t want to miss these six new romance novels! Packed with irresistible chemistry, laugh-out-loud moments, and plenty of heart, these stories deliver all the feels. Whether you love unexpected love stories, second chances, or charmingly chaotic relationships, these books are sure to steal your heart. Get ready to fall head over heels! My Plus One = You by Angela Haas Release Date: January 30 2025 Rachel and Cam strike a deal to survive wedding season as each other’s plus-one—no strings, no romance. But as they navigate champagne toasts and dances under the stars, exes reappear, and their friendship deepens into something more. Set in Scottsdale, this heartfelt story celebrates friendship, second chances, and love’s unexpected timing. Buy on Amazon This Wild Heart (Wilder Family) by Karla Sorensen Release Date: February 7 2025 It’s all fun and fake marriage until the day he gets a knock on the door with the surprise of a lifetime. Until the bomb goes off and we’re left to pick up the pieces. Until the pretending stops and we’re left with only one question: was any of it real? Buy on Amazon Strictly Pretend (The Salinger Brothers Book 6) by Carrie Elks Release Date: January 31 2025 He’s irritatingly perfect in the role of devoted boyfriend, and worse, I’m starting to believe it. But he’s still the enemy, the one I’m supposed to hate. So why does one searing look from him have me wishing our fake love was something I could keep? Buy on Amazon Not Your Biggest Fan (Not Yours) by Sara Ney Release Date: January 28 2025 In a messy twist of fate, Andy finds himself in the same hotel as Harlow. When she collects on their bet, they make a mind-blowing—and bed-rocking—connection. But after the weekend, she goes home to Green Bay to her goofy dad and corgi, ready to focus everything on work again. Kissmet, however, has other ideas, when Andy knocks on her door… Buy on Amazon The Other Brother (London Hearts Series Book One) by Tierney Page Release Date: January 15 2025 Opening my heart to someone so close to the man who shattered it feels ridiculous. But it’s undeniable, and I can’t resist. Trying to stay away only makes it worse. I want him. I’m falling for the one person I shouldn’t. I’m falling for the other brother. Buy on Amazon Dream Girl Drama (Big Shots Book 3) by Tessa Bailey Release Date: February 4 2025 A steamy chance encounter between a professional hockey player and the manic pixie dream girl he just can’t seem to forget takes a turn when the pair realize that their parents are engaged—in an all-new rom-com by #1 New York Times bestselling author Tessa Bailey. html:
07 Feb 2025

6 New Romance Novels for Fans of Kinda Pregnant

Love the swoon-worthy romance and heartfelt humor of Kinda Pregnant? Then you won’t want to miss these six new romance novels! Packed with irresistible chemistry, laugh-out-loud moments, and plenty of heart, these stories deliver all the feels. Whether you love unexpected love stories, second chances, or charmingly chaotic relationships, these books are sure to steal your heart. Get ready to fall head over heels!

My Plus One = You

by Angela Haas

Release Date: January 30 2025

Rachel and Cam strike a deal to survive wedding season as each other’s plus-one—no strings, no romance. But as they navigate champagne toasts and dances under the stars, exes reappear, and their friendship deepens into something more. Set in Scottsdale, this heartfelt story celebrates friendship, second chances, and love’s unexpected timing.

Buy on Amazon

This Wild Heart (Wilder Family)

by Karla Sorensen

Release Date: February 7 2025

It’s all fun and fake marriage until the day he gets a knock on the door with the surprise of a lifetime. Until the bomb goes off and we’re left to pick up the pieces. Until the pretending stops and we’re left with only one question: was any of it real?

Buy on Amazon

Strictly Pretend (The Salinger Brothers Book 6)

by Carrie Elks

Release Date: January 31 2025

He’s irritatingly perfect in the role of devoted boyfriend, and worse, I’m starting to believe it. But he’s still the enemy, the one I’m supposed to hate. So why does one searing look from him have me wishing our fake love was something I could keep?

Buy on Amazon

Not Your Biggest Fan (Not Yours)

by Sara Ney

Release Date: January 28 2025

In a messy twist of fate, Andy finds himself in the same hotel as Harlow. When she collects on their bet, they make a mind-blowing—and bed-rocking—connection. But after the weekend, she goes home to Green Bay to her goofy dad and corgi, ready to focus everything on work again. Kissmet, however, has other ideas, when Andy knocks on her door…

Buy on Amazon

The Other Brother (London Hearts Series Book One)

by Tierney Page

Release Date: January 15 2025

Opening my heart to someone so close to the man who shattered it feels ridiculous. But it’s undeniable, and I can’t resist. Trying to stay away only makes it worse. I want him. I’m falling for the one person I shouldn’t. I’m falling for the other brother.

Buy on Amazon

Dream Girl Drama (Big Shots Book 3)

by Tessa Bailey

Release Date: February 4 2025

A steamy chance encounter between a professional hockey player and the manic pixie dream girl he just can’t seem to forget takes a turn when the pair realize that their parents are engaged—in an all-new rom-com by #1 New York Times bestselling author Tessa Bailey.

Buy on Amazon
